Package org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules.jtsisvalidrules

Class Summary
GeometryMustHaveValidCoordinates Checks if geometry coordinates are valid.
GeometryMustNotHaveFewPoints This rule checks that every geometry has at least the minimun number of points to correctly define it.
IGeometryMustBeClosed This rule checks if an FMap geometry is closed, always applying a given snap tolerance.
JtsValidTopologyError A kind of TopologyError caused by the violation of a JtsValid rule.
MultiPolygonMustNotHaveNestedShells  
PolygonHolesMustBeInShell This rule checks that all polygon holes must be contained in the exterior shell.
PolygonHolesMustNotBeNested  
PolygonMustHaveConnectedInterior Esta regla chequea que los holes de un polígono, que por definicion pueden tocarse entre sí en un punto así como con el borde exterior hagan que el interior del poligono esté inconexo.
PolygonMustNotHaveDuplicatedRings This rule checks it two rings in a polygon of a polygon layer are equivalent.
PolygonMustNotHaveHoles  
PolygonMustNotHaveSelfIntersectedRings
